interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz
Review Date: 2020/09/19
Store: Zeitun
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'}
Review Text: I didn't notice a distinct fragrance from this scrub.  It does faintly smell of coffee but I had hoped there would be more of a spicy smell.  But, this is a nice feeling scrub against your skin.  It does make your skin feel energized.  I'm not sure how long it would take to make my cellulite become less visible but I will keep using it for the mere purpose that it does feel good.  I would say too that it would make a good gift because it's so unique.  I do recommend this product and for the price it's a good value for either a gift or keeping it for yourself as a treat.  Enjoy!
Review Title: Coffee Scrub
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Gents of London Design Paste Matt Firm Hold Professional Hair Styling Wax (3 oz) GENTS OF LONDON {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Liquid Volume': '3 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Brand': 'GENTS OF LONDON'} This hair paste is awesome! for the price, it almost even out performs some way more expensive hair products! I used to use Paul Mitchell hair paste, but this is probably going to be my go to now.

This stuff does have somewhat of a smell, but it smells sort of like the original old spice. It's not too strong though, but if you want something scentless, then you may wanna try something else. Smells Kinda like Old Spice Sdara Aloe Vera Gel For Face and Body - Organic & Natural, Soothing & Cooling For Sunburn Relief, Restorative For Dry Skin - Made In USA Sdara Skincare {'Brand': 'Sdara Skincare', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 2.3 x 1.3 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '707486993085'} Seriously there’s nothing better on a sunburn than Aloe Vera. It’s natural and won’t harm your skin. This aloe has a clear color so there’s no artificial dyes contained in this gel. Just pure headlining and soothing properties. I feel for the size of the bottle, it’s a great bargain and it’s effective. Cooling Natural Aloe Vera 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult) Vedory ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.'] {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'} These really do help to make wearing a mask a little easier to breathe. I don't like wearing mine and I don't have to for very long, but this does help with air circulation underneath your mask. If you're having a hard time, give these a try. They are a great value and seem to be very sturdy. Mask Brackets Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz Zeitun {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'} I didn't notice a distinct fragrance from this scrub. It does faintly smell of coffee but I had hoped there would be more of a spicy smell. But, this is a nice feeling scrub against your skin. It does make your skin feel energized. I'm not sure how long it would take to make my cellulite become less visible but I will keep using it for the mere purpose that it does feel good. I would say too that it would make a good gift because it's so unique. I do recommend this product and for the price it's a good value for either a gift or keeping it for yourself as a treat. Enjoy! Coffee Scrub
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Preference:** The user prioritizes effective hair styling products, favoring professional-grade items that provide a firm hold. They demonstrate a tendency to switch from higher-priced brands to more affordable alternatives that deliver similar results.

- **Scent Sensitivity:** The user shows a moderate tolerance for scents, preferring subtle fragrances. Their recent experience showcases an appreciation for mild aromas, particularly with natural scents, indicating a desire for subtlety in their personal care products.

- **Brand Loyalty:** The user exhibits flexibility in brand allegiance, willing to explore new products based on performance rather than brand loyalty alone. They favor high-quality, natural items and are open to unique offerings that deliver effectiveness.

- **Value-Consciousness:** The user values good quality and effectiveness, demonstrated by their consideration of products seen as great bargains for size and efficacy. They are inclined to switch to alternatives that provide superior quality at a better price, reflecting a budget-conscious approach.

- **Health & Safety Preferences:** The user demonstrates a proactive approach to health and comfort, showing appreciation for products that enhance usability and functionality. Their recent purchases indicate a focus on products that feel good on the skin and contribute positively to their overall experience.

Overall, the user prioritizes performance and quality in personal care, emphasizes value-driven choices, and seeks products that combine comfort and effectiveness, discerning in their selections while remaining budget-conscious.
